posts.post_content:
It's so funny that Avacyn Restored has so much Zombie Hate, because there's only like five in the set. Even less of them that are actually playable.   
  
Sheer sideboard material, and near useless unless you opened a bunch of [flowering lumberknot](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=flowering lumberknot)s in your sealed packs.

posts.post_content:
Cyberium, your scenario reminded me of Left 4 Dead 2.  
  
Seriously, when you played it, did you ever find try to beat it without partners? As in, it was you, and the other three survivors died? It's impossible!  
  
I suppose that's what's here: This guy knows how to deal with Zombies well, but he needs someone else to cover his back, in case a Charger starts pummelling him.
